turkish_example_sentence: Onlar spor salonunda ağır dumbelleri antrenmanlarında kullanacaklardı.
english_example_sentence: They were going to use the heavy dumbbells in their workouts at the gym.
russian_example_sentence: Они собирались использовать тяжелые гантели в своих тренировках в спортзале.
